bm_desc: Intimation of Board Meeting to be held on August 20, 2024 of Brightcom Group Limited;
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2023
To consider and approve the Second Interim Dividend on equity shares, if any, for the Financial Year 2024-25.
To consider Fund Raising and other business matters
To consider dividend and other business matters
To consider buyback for equity shares
